subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: For years, general managers at baseball’s winter meetings made trades in hushed hotel lobbies, but deals now usually take place away from frenzied gatherings of fans, scouts, reporters and agents.
snippet: For years, general managers at baseball’s winter meetings made trades in hushed hotel lobbies, but deals now usually take place away from frenzied gatherings of fans, scouts, reporters and agents.
